Issue.creator: yedendra
Issue.summary: proposal response error object message wraps shim.Error message as string
Issue.description: shim.Error(" invoke/query --> getDocuments json: cannot unmarshal object into Go value of type string") In the nodejs SDK, the error is received as follows: error.message = "chaincode error (status: 500, message: invoke/query --> getDocuments json: cannot unmarshal object into Go value of type string)" The error message should be same as the string passed in shim.Error. >
